coded_answer.p: Dear Mrs Smith, Thank you for your letter of asking for my help towith the conference. I would like to help you with my bestto do my best to help you.

Firstly, Palace Hotel has been booked into for the groupgroup's accomodationaccommodation and I spoke with the hotel manager forabout travelingtravelling to the conference. The hotel has theirits own buses, they will picktake us from the hotel to the conference saloon.

Secondly, I would like to tell you more about the end-of-conference party. I booked the Palace Hotel's restaurant for our party and it is big enough for your students. It is going to be very lovely and enjoyable because I have lots of surprises for the students. In addition, I suggest that they should wear sporty and comfortable clothes.

Finally, you would like to know about some activities for three hours of free time. I think you can go to the 'Dreamland'. In this place there isare video games, some little competitions and a small zoo available. Students can enjoy their time in this place and it is on the way ofto the airport.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Re: Information on an interesting building to visit
Here is my report for American students who want information on an interesting building to visit in Ankara. I would like to describe 'Anitkabir'

1. This building's name is 'Anitkabir' and it is the biggest building in Ankara. It builtwas built in 1953. It is placedlocated in the middle of the forest. There isare different kindkinds of birdbirds and different kindkinds of trees present.
2. ItThere hasis a very big museum inside the building and all the building madeis made from stone.
3. This building's security guards are very special soldiers. Their aim is to protect the building from the enemies because there is also a very big army museum available.
4. ItThere hasis no charge for entrance and it has a good view for tourists to seeingsee Ankara from the hill. It opens atfrom 8.00 am to 5.00 pm.
I recommendthink that it is the best building in Ankara to visit because it includes all Turkish history and very good sight seeingsightseeing.
